About Me

A few things about me....

BIO

Having worked in multiple challenging fields the past decade has built a sense of excitement in me when given a challenge. Jumping into programming has lit that fire in me even more. Every project or task is a new challenge or problem to solve that excited me. My name is Leonard Canastra. I am a Software Engineer that loves a challenge and has found his calling in Tech. Everyday I aim for newer heights and bigger challenges. I have 10 years of experience in a manufacturing and construction environment following standard operation procedures, working in big teams full of diverse people and ensuring that all the processes run at peak performance everyday. I have helped lower waste in processes in every area I have worked in and increase efficency in the workflow. I now use these skills everyday in my Software Development processes.

Homeroots Designs

Front End Development

Created full stack web applications and static websites for different clients across small and medium size businesses. Also, consulted on SEO and social media strategy,

100 Devs

Software Engineer

As a developer with 100 Devs I collaborated with a team of developers to build modern and responsive web applications using best practices such as mobile first and using semantic HTML. Working with teams we applied agile methodologies like SCRUM for project management.

Mckee Foods

Process and Machine Operator

At Mckee Foods I worked in many different process positions. Each one required me to always look for ways to cut waste in processes and find ways to increase efficency. Through this I was able to save the company 3% in costs by providing solutions to waste and increasing efficiency of processes.
